contentrichtext.text: [[Image:Mitchellville_Iowa_20100328_Corectional_Ins.JPG|left|thumb|200px|Prison entrance]] <!-- Deleted image removed: [[Image:Idocmap.gif|thumbnail|right|500px|Map of Iowa correctional institutions.]] --> {{coord|41.663|-93.365|region:US-IA_type:landmark|display=title}} '''Iowa Correctional Institution for Women''' is an [[Iowa Department of Corrections]] medium/minimum security prison located in [[Mitchellville, Iowa|Mitchellville]], [[Iowa]].<ref>"[http://www.doc.state.ia.us/institutions_detail.asp?id=16 Iowa Correctional Institution for Women]." [[Iowa Department of Corrections]]. Retrieved on November 29, 2010.</ref> As of 2002 it had some 190 staff and 510 inmates. It has both [[dormitory]] style units and celled housing, as well as a "return-to-confinement" facility used for intensive treatment of repeat offenders who violate parole. ==See also== {{Portal|Iowa}} * [[List of Iowa state prisons]] ==References== {{reflist}} ==External links== * http://www.doc.state.ia.us/InstitutionDesc.asp [[Category:Women's prisons in the United States]] [[Category:Prisons in Iowa]] [[Category:Buildings and structures in Polk County, Iowa]] {{Iowa-struct-stub}} {{US-prison-stub}}
